items.title: Buffett cuts BofA stake below 10%, letting him trade in secret
items.description: Bank of Americaâ€™s stock has underperformed throughout the liquidations. It had been No. 1 in the 24-company KBW Bank Index this year as of July 16. Since then, it has been the second-worst performer. In the latest round, Berkshire unloaded $382.4 million of shares over three days.

items.title: TCS gets bullish brokerage calls despite Q2 miss, BSNL, BFSI recovery to drive growth; check share price targets
items.description: A slow demand recovery and margin contraction hit TCS's second quarter earnings, but going forward, tech and BFSI demand recovery will aid revenue, while BSNL deal unwinding will help margins.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US markets down, Asia trades higher
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Thursday as investors looked to higher-than-expected inflation and unemployment claims for indications on the health of the U.S. economy and the path for interest rates. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 57.88 points, or 0.14%, to 42,454.12, the S&P 500 lost 11.99 points, or 0.21%, to 5,780.05 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 9.57 points, or 0.05%, to 18,282.05.

items.title: Citi warns further regulatory delays at Goa facility could erode Cipla's Abraxane opportunity
items.description: Abraxane accounts for 6-7 percent of Citi's earnings-per-stock estimates for FY26/27 for Cipla, excluding contributions from Revlimid.

items.title: Anand Rathi Wealth stock zooms 6% after upbeat Q2 earnings show
items.description: Anand Rathi's Q2 earnings showcased growth on all key parameters of net profit, revenue and profitability. Mutual fund distribution revenue, as well as net inflows also posted strong growth in the quarter gone by.

items.title: Tata Elxsi shares edge higher after solid Q2 results; stock underperforms Nifty YTD

items.title: Bondada Engg stock soars 5% after Rs 1,132 crore order wins
items.description: Bondada Engineering has won two EPC (Engineering, Procurement and Construction) contracts under the MSKVY 2.0 scheme to develop crystalline ground-mounted solar PV power plants in multiple districts across Maharashtra.

items.title: Stock of the day| V-Guard Industries Ltd firing on all growth cylinders| Should you invest?
items.description: VIL has established itself as a leading electrical brand in India, best known for its market leadership in stabilisers. Over the years, the company has successfully diversified its product portfolio and expanded its presence across the country, evolving into a multi-product company. Currently, VIL is focused on strengthening its position in non-southern markets. Its growing in-house manufacturing capabilities are expected to drive margin expansion

items.title: Ashoka Metcast stock zooms 20% to hit upper circuit after Q2 net profit surges 894% YoY
items.description: Shares of Ashoka Metcast hit 20 percet upper circuit limit after the company reported a staggering 894.29 percent YoY increase in net profit to Rs 3.48 crore for the quarter ending September 2024

items.title: Hold Tata Elxsi; target of Rs 7590: ICICI Securities
items.description: ICICI Securities recommended hold rating on Tata Elxsi with a target price of Rs 7590 in its research report dated October 11, 2024.

items.title: Cummins India stock tumbles 6% on Goldman Sachs' downgrade to 'sell'
items.description: Goldman says a weak macroeconomic environment and stringent emission norms are likely to limit export growth rates for the company.

items.title: Accumulate Muthoot Finance; target of Rs 2140: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended accumulate rating on Muthoot Finance with a target price of Rs 2140 in its research report dated October 10, 2024.
